languages.text: "За то время, пока я не нашел способ сбросить ярмо, я был свидетелем ужасающей ереси... извлечение Истинной плоти и ее декомпозиция на алтарях... извращенные процедуры, порождающие {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}еретеховые{/g} ужасы... я даже сопровождал падшего магоса к самому Фабрикатор-Цензору и был при темной мессе, которую служил он лично! Этот злокозненный ритуал, полный намеренных вариативностей и нескрываемых погрешностей... все для того, чтобы во имя Последнего восхода сотворить богопротивное чудовище!"

traits.locale_text: "По приказу Фабрикатора предатели взялись за темную мессу — ритуал, полный намеренных вариативностей и нескрываемых погрешностей... все для того, чтобы сотворить чудовище, облеченное металлом и питающееся жаром скверны из глубин ада! И все это время они пели... пели литании Последнему восходу, что должен принести избавление!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Before I found a way to throw off the compulsion, I witnessed horrifying heresy... the extraction of True Flesh and its decomposition on altars... perverse procedures that resulted in {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretechnical{/g} abominations... I even accompanied a fallen Magos to the Fabricator-Censor himself and attended the unholy mass he led personally! It was a wicked ritual, full of wilful deviations and blatant inaccuracies... all to create an ungodly monster in the name of the final dawn!"
languages.original_text: "За то время, пока я не нашел способ сбросить ярмо, я был свидетелем ужасающей ереси... извлечение Истинной плоти и ее декомпозиция на алтарях... извращенные процедуры, порождающие {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}еретеховые{/g} ужасы... я даже сопровождал падшего магоса к самому Фабрикатор-Цензору и был при темной мессе, которую служил он лично! Этот злокозненный ритуал, полный намеренных вариативностей и нескрываемых погрешностей... все для того, чтобы во имя Последнего восхода сотворить богопротивное чудовище!"

traits.locale_text: "Before I found a way to throw off the compulsion, I witnessed horrifying heresy... the extraction of True Flesh and its decomposition on altars... perverse procedures that resulted in heretical abominations... I even accompanied a fallen magos to the Fabricator himself and attended the unholy mass he led personally! It was a wicked ritual, full of willful deviations and blatant inaccuracies... all to create an ungodly monster in the name of the final dawn!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

I even accompanied a fallen magos to the Fabricator himself and attended the unholy mass he led personally! It was a wicked ritual, full of willful deviations and blatant inaccuracies... all to create an ungodly monster in the name of the final dawn!"

I even accompanied a fallen magos to the Fabricator himself and attended the unholy mass he led personally! It was a wicked ritual, full of willful deviations and blatant inaccuracies... all to create an ungodly monster in the name of the final dawn!"

traits.locale_text: "Before I found a way to throw off the compulsion, I witnessed horrifying heresy... the extraction of True Flesh and its decomposition on altars... perverse procedures that resulted in {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretechnical{/g} abominations... I even accompanied a fallen Magos to the Fabricator-Censor himself and attended the unholy mass he led personally! It was a wicked ritual, full of wilful deviations and blatant inaccuracies... all to create an ungodly monster in the name of the final dawn!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: “我还没来得及找到方法摆脱腐化，就亲眼目睹了恐怖的异端行为……他们提取了实肉，将其在祭坛上分解……他们依靠变态的程序制造出了充满{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}异端技术{/g}的怪物……我甚至陪着堕落的贤者去见铸造审查师本人，还参加了他亲自举行的邪恶弥撒！那是个亵渎性的仪式，充满了有意为之的偏差与厚颜无耻的谬误……这所有的一切，都是为了以‘终末黎明’之名制造渎神的怪物！”
languages.original_text: "Before I found a way to throw off the compulsion, I witnessed horrifying heresy... the extraction of True Flesh and its decomposition on altars... perverse procedures that resulted in {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretechnical{/g} abominations... I even accompanied a fallen Magos to the Fabricator-Censor himself and attended the unholy mass he led personally! It was a wicked ritual, full of wilful deviations and blatant inaccuracies... all to create an ungodly monster in the name of the final dawn!"

traits.locale_text: “我还没来得及找到方法摆脱腐化，就亲眼目睹了恐怖的异端行为……他们提取了实肉，将其在祭坛上分解……他们依靠变态的程序制造出了充满异端技术的怪物……我甚至陪着堕落的贤者去见铸造审查师本人，还参加了他亲自举行的邪恶弥撒！那是个亵渎性的仪式，充满了有意为之的偏差与厚颜无耻的谬误……这所有的一切，都是为了以‘终末黎明’之名制造渎神的怪物！”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: «Antes de encontrar la forma de rechazar el impulso, fui testigo de herejías aterradoras... la extracción de la auténtica carne y su descomposición en altares... procedimientos perversos que resultaron en abominaciones {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}tecnoheréticas{/g}... ¡Incluso acompañé a un mago caído hasta el mismo fabricator-censor y asistí a la misa impía que dirigió en persona! Fue un ritual maligno, lleno de alteraciones descaradas y malinterpretaciones intencionales... ¡Todo para crear un monstruo sacrílego en nombre del amanecer final!».
languages.original_text: "Before I found a way to throw off the compulsion, I witnessed horrifying heresy... the extraction of True Flesh and its decomposition on altars... perverse procedures that resulted in {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretechnical{/g} abominations... I even accompanied a fallen Magos to the Fabricator-Censor himself and attended the unholy mass he led personally! It was a wicked ritual, full of wilful deviations and blatant inaccuracies... all to create an ungodly monster in the name of the final dawn!"

traits.locale_text: «Antes de encontrar la forma de rechazar el impulso, fui testigo de herejías aterradoras... la extracción de la auténtica carne y su descomposición en altares... procedimientos perversos que resultaron en abominaciones tecnoheréticas... ¡Incluso acompañé a un mago caído hasta el mismo fabricator-censor y asistí a la misa impía que dirigió en persona! Fue un ritual maligno, lleno de alteraciones descaradas y malinterpretaciones intencionales... ¡Todo para crear un monstruo sacrílego en nombre del amanecer final!».
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: 「強迫衝動を排除する方法を見つける前、恐ろしい異端を目撃しました…真なる肉体の抽出と祭壇上での腐敗…唾棄すべき{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}異端技術{/g}をもたらした倒錯的な手順…堕落したマゴスに同行して、ファブリケーター・センサーのもとへ行き、彼が自ら率いる不浄のミサに参列したこともあります！それは不浄の儀式であり、故意の逸脱と不正確さに満ちていました…すべては、最後の夜明けの名の下に、不浄の怪物を生み出すためのものなのです！」
languages.original_text: "Before I found a way to throw off the compulsion, I witnessed horrifying heresy... the extraction of True Flesh and its decomposition on altars... perverse procedures that resulted in {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretechnical{/g} abominations... I even accompanied a fallen Magos to the Fabricator-Censor himself and attended the unholy mass he led personally! It was a wicked ritual, full of wilful deviations and blatant inaccuracies... all to create an ungodly monster in the name of the final dawn!"

traits.locale_text: 「強迫衝動を排除する方法を見つける前、恐ろしい異端を目撃しました…真なる肉体の抽出と祭壇上での腐敗…唾棄すべき{g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}異端技術{/g}をもたらした倒錯的な手順…堕落したマゴスに同行して、ファブリケーター・センサーのもとへ行き、彼が自ら率いる不浄のミサに参列したこともあります！それは不浄の儀式であり、故意の逸脱と不正確さに満ちていました…すべては、最後の夜明けの名の下に、不浄の怪物を生み出すためのものなのです！」
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Bevor ich einen Weg fand, diesen Zwang abzuschütteln, wurde ich Zeuge entsetzlicher Ketzereien ... der Entnahme Wahren Fleischs und seines Zerfalls auf Altären ... perverse Prozeduren, die {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}Häretech{/g}-Abscheulichkeiten hervorbrachten ... Ich begleitete sogar einen gefallenen Magos zum Fabricator-Zensor persönlich und nahm an dessen unheiliger Messe teil! Es war ein böses Ritual voller absichtlicher Abweichungen und offenkundiger Fehler ... nur um im Namen der letzten Dämmerung ein gottloses Monster zu erschaffen!"
languages.original_text: "Before I found a way to throw off the compulsion, I witnessed horrifying heresy... the extraction of True Flesh and its decomposition on altars... perverse procedures that resulted in {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretechnical{/g} abominations... I even accompanied a fallen Magos to the Fabricator-Censor himself and attended the unholy mass he led personally! It was a wicked ritual, full of wilful deviations and blatant inaccuracies... all to create an ungodly monster in the name of the final dawn!"

traits.locale_text: "Bevor ich einen Weg fand, diesen Zwang abzuschütteln, wurde ich Zeuge entsetzlicher Ketzereien ... der Entnahme Wahren Fleischs und seines Zerfalls auf Altären ... perverse Prozeduren, die Häretech-Abscheulichkeiten hervorbrachten ... Ich begleitete sogar einen gefallenen Magos zum Fabricator-Zensor persönlich und nahm an dessen unheiliger Messe teil! Es war ein böses Ritual voller absichtlicher Abweichungen und offenkundiger Fehler ... nur um im Namen der letzten Dämmerung ein gottloses Monster zu erschaffen!"
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: « Avant de réussir à me soustraire à cette compulsion, j'ai été témoin d'effroyables actes d'hérésie... L'extraction de la chair véritable et sa décomposition sur les autels... Des procédures perverses qui ont donné naissance à des abominations {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}hérétechniques{/g}... J'ai même accompagné un magos déchu à la messe menée par le fabricator-censeur en personne et j'y ai participé ! C'était un rituel maléfique qui détournait et déformait la vérité de manière éhontée... dans l'unique but de créer un monstre infernal au nom de l'aube finale ! »
languages.original_text: "Before I found a way to throw off the compulsion, I witnessed horrifying heresy... the extraction of True Flesh and its decomposition on altars... perverse procedures that resulted in {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretechnical{/g} abominations... I even accompanied a fallen Magos to the Fabricator-Censor himself and attended the unholy mass he led personally! It was a wicked ritual, full of wilful deviations and blatant inaccuracies... all to create an ungodly monster in the name of the final dawn!"

traits.locale_text: « Avant de réussir à me soustraire à cette compulsion, j'ai été témoin d'effroyables actes d'hérésie... L'extraction de la chair véritable et sa décomposition sur les autels... Des procédures perverses qui ont donné naissance à des abominations hérétechniques... J'ai même accompagné un magos déchu à la messe menée par le fabricator-censeur en personne et j'y ai participé ! C'était un rituel maléfique qui détournait et déformait la vérité de manière éhontée... dans l'unique but de créer un monstre infernal au nom de l'aube finale ! »
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest

languages.text: "Bu güdüyü bastırmanın bir yolunu bulmadan önce feci kâfirliklere şahit oldum... Salt Suret'i alıp sunaklarda çürüttüler... Makûs eylemlerle {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}teküfürsel{/g} garabetler yarattılar... Günahkâr bir Magos'u Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün ta kendisine götürüp önderlik ettiği meşum ayine bizzat katıldım! Fena bir ayindi, kasıtlı sapkınlıklar ve bariz yalanlarla doluydu... Tüm bunları nihai şafak adına meşum bir canavar yaratmak için yaptılar!"
languages.original_text: "Before I found a way to throw off the compulsion, I witnessed horrifying heresy... the extraction of True Flesh and its decomposition on altars... perverse procedures that resulted in {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}heretechnical{/g} abominations... I even accompanied a fallen Magos to the Fabricator-Censor himself and attended the unholy mass he led personally! It was a wicked ritual, full of wilful deviations and blatant inaccuracies... all to create an ungodly monster in the name of the final dawn!"

traits.locale_text: “Bu güdüyü bastırmanın bir yolunu bulmadan önce feci kâfirliklere şahit oldum... Salt Suret’i alıp sunaklarda çürüttüler... Makûs eylemlerle {g|Encyclopedia:Heretech}kâfennî{/g} garabetler yarattılar... Günahkâr bir Magos’u Denetçi Fabrikatör’ün ta kendisine götürüp önderlik ettiği meşum ayine bizzat katıldım! Fena bir ayindi, kasıtlı sapkınlıklar ve bariz yalanlarla doluydu... Tüm bunları nihai şafağın adına meşum bir canavar yaratmak için yaptılar!”
traits.speaker: ScrappedTechpriest
